title: SPARE
author: SPARE
content: - Binance has agreed to pay fine totatling $4.3 billion.CZ's plea deal may preserve the companys ability to operate.CZ will retain majority owernership of binance.CZ will not be able to hold an excutive role at the company.CZ could face up to 16 months jail.

comments.author: alterra57
comments.body: 1. Wrong section.2. CZ won't spend a day in jail, daycare at most.3. It's not 4.6 billion, they're talking about lowering that.

comments.author: Marvelman
comments.body: SPARE, you posted a new thread on a topic that's already being discussed.  I get it - it's easy to miss existing threads, especially if there are a lot of posts.  But doing a quick search first helps keep things organized and prevents duplicate topics.  Searching just takes a few seconds and saves everyone hassle down the road.  No biggie, just something to keep in mind next time.
